name: Google Analytics
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Analytics 节点。主要用于: Use the Google Analytics API

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: report

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: search
available_options: Search (值: search) - Return user activity data

viewId.name: viewId
viewId.description: The View ID of Google Analytics. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
viewId.natural_language_description: 参数名: View Name or ID | 作用: The View ID of Google Analytics. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: activityTypes (值: None) - Type of activites requested

userId.name: userId
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User ID | 作用: ID of a user | (必填项)
